titleStmt.title: Antichrist arraigned in a sermon at Pauls Crosse, the third Sunday after Epiphanie. With the tryall of guides, on the fourth Sunday after Trinitie. By Thomas Thompson, Bachelour in Diuinitie, and preacher of Gods Word.
titleStmt.author: Thompson, Thomas, b. 1574?

titleStmt.title: Antichrist arraigned in a sermon at Pauls Crosse, the third Sunday after Epiphanie. With the tryall of guides, on the fourth Sunday after Trinitie. By Thomas Thompson, Bachelour in Diuinitie, and preacher of Gods Word.
titleStmt.author: Thompson, Thomas, b. 1574?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby, for Richard Meighen, and are to be sold at this shop at Saint Clements Church, ouer-against Essex House, and at Westminster Hall,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank. Variant: last leaf bears colophon.
"The trial of guides" has separate dated title page and pagination; register is continuous.
"The trial of guides" identified as STC 24029 on UMI microfilm reel 1644.
Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
